CA_CE_CONCESSIONAIRE_PROFILE.CONTACT_POINT: Todor Seizov; Adrijana Momirovska; Majda Ristovska
CA_CE_CONCESSIONAIRE_PROFILE.ATTENTION: SELECTION OF AGENCY FOR TEMPORARY EMPLOYMENT SERVICES FOR 2018 FOR THE NEEDS OF THE MINISTRY OF AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY AND WATER ЕCONOMY

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Selection of agency for temporary employment services for 2018 for the needs of the Ministry of agriculture, forestry, and water economy

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Selection of agency for temporary employment services for 2018 for the needs of the Ministry of agriculture, forestry, and water economy.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: 2.2 Personal condition:
2.2.1 The contracting authority shall exclude any economic operator from the proceedings for awarding a public contract in the following cases:
— it has been rendered a verdict for participation in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering in the last 5 years,
— it has been sentenced to a minor penalty: ban to participate in public tender procedures, awarding contracts and agreements for a public-private partnership,
— it has been sentenced to a minor penalty for temporary or permanent prohibition to perform a specific activity,
— it is in bankruptcy or liquidation proceedings,

— it has unpaid taxes and other public charges unless the economic operator is authorized to make deferred payment of taxes, contributions, and other public duties in accordance with relevant regulations and if he is a regular payer,
— prohibition sanction to perform professional activity or duty is pronounced to the economic operator, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing the professional activity, and,
— it provides false information or fails to submit the information requested by the contracting authority.
2.2.2 In order to prove its personal condition, the economic operator shall submit the following documents:
— a declaration by the economic operator that he was not rendered a verdict for participation in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering in the last 5 years,
— confirmation that there are no bankruptcy proceedings undertaken by the competent authority,
— confirmation that there is no liquidation procedure undertaken by the competent authority,
— receipt of paid taxes, contributions and other public duties by the competent authority of the country where the economic operator is established,
— certificate from the Registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that minor penalty:
— — ban to participate in public tender procedures, awarding contracts and agreements for a public-private partnership - has not been imposed,
— certificate from the Registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that minor penalty for a temporary or a permanent prohibition of a specific activity has not been imposed,

— confirmation that the final sentence has not been imposed as a criminal sanction that prohibits performing professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing a specific activity.
2.2.3 The statement in indent 1 of subsection 2.2.2 shall be prepared and signed by the economic operator and it does not have to be certified by a competent authority.

2.2.4 The confirmations that there are no bankruptcy proceedings and liquidation proceedings, as well as the certificates from the Register of penalties for criminal acts in indents 5 and 6 of subsection 2.2.2, shall be issued by competent authorities in the country in which the economic operator is established. In the Republic of Macedonia, the body responsible for issuing these certificates is the Central Registry of the Republic of Macedonia.

2.2.5 The receipt for paid taxes, contributions, and other charges shall be issued by a competent authority of the country in which the economic operator is established. In the Republic of Macedonia, the authority to issue such certificates is the Public Revenue Office.

2.2.6 The receipt in indent 7 of subsection 2.2.2 shall be issued by the competent authority in the country in which the economic operator is established. In the Republic of Macedonia, the authority to issue this certificate is the Central Registry of the Republic of Macedonia.

2.2.7 The documents referred to in sub-item 2.2.2 must not be older than 6 months from the deadline for submission of bids, and they shall be submitted in an original and copy certified by the economic operator.

2.2.8 If the country in which the economic operator is registered does not issue the documents referred to in sub-item 2.2.2 or if they do not encompass all the cases mentioned above, the economic operator may submit a statement certified by a competent authority.
2.3 Ability to perform a professional activity.

2.3.1 In order to demonstrate the ability to perform professional activity, the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity, as proof that it is registered as a natural or legal entity for conducting activities related to the subject of the contract for public procurement, or proof that it belongs to a professional association in accordance with the regulations of the country in which it is registered, i.e. a DRA form.

2.3.2 Evidence issued by a competent body for fulfilling the special conditions for performing the activities prescribed in accordance with the law that relates to the subject of the contract. Pursuant to Article 148, paragraph 2, when determining the professional activity of the economic operators, the contracting authority shall also require evidence issued by a competent body for fulfilling special conditions for performing the activities prescribed in accordance with the law that relates to the subject of the contract, ie:

— license for temporary employment issued by the Ministry competent for labor matters, in accordance with the Law on Temporary Employment Agencies Fig. Journal no. 49/06, 102/08, 145/10, 316/11, 13/13, 38/14, 98/15, 147/15, 27/16.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: Electronic-auction shall be performed as the last phase of the procedure for the awarding a contract (detailed information stated in tender documents).

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Ministry of agriculture, forestry and water economy of the Republic of Macedonia, Aminta III nr.2, Skopje.

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Additional information about authorized persons and opening procedure: Responsible person or person authorized by the responsible person.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: The tender documents are available on the website www.e-nabavki.gov.mk (nr. 05-67/2018 dd. 02.01.2018)
